title: The Day We Saved the World
description: Alex Tice is an ordinary boy with an extraordinary power. On the day of his 13th birthday, Alex’s world is turned upside down. He learns a secret that has been kept quiet from ‘normal’ humans for centuries. When Alex is brought to a super hero camp, his wildest fantasies are suddenly a reality. Only, there are people in the world that are tired of hiding their powers, and are ready to be known. What will this mean for society? Are the people of the world in danger?  Come join Alex and his new super human friends as they live out an adventure we never thought was possible. But before you start, you need to ask yourself one question… Do you believe in superheroes?
author: Katie Smotherman
